from Crypto.Util.number import *
from secret import flag
m=bytes_to_long(flag)
p=getStrongPrime(1024)
q=getStrongPrime(1024)
phi=(p-1)*(q-1)
e1=inverse(getPrime(768),phi)
e2=inverse(getPrime(768),phi)
e3=inverse(getPrime(768),phi)
n=p*q
c=pow(m,0x10001,n)
print(f'e1={e1}')
print(f'e2={e2}')
print(f'e3={e3}')
print(f'c={c}')
print(f'n={n}')
